name: I Won't Let You Fail
description:
I Won't Let You Fail my entry into the Wowie Jam 3.0. The theme was Failure is Progress: Let's mess with the concepts of winning and losing.

In this game you are a blob within a sminulation. SEPIA, an AI guardian is watching over you and caring for you. Don't worry, they won't let any harm come to you. Too bad that's the only way to escape this maddening simulation.

Controls
  • Left: A / Left Arrow
  • Right: D / Right Arrow
  • Jump: W / Up Arrow / Space
Credits

Most of this game was created by me within a weekend, including game design, programming, and most of the art. However, i would not have been able to complete this without some external assets:

Graphics

 This includes some UI elements, and all cyan colored platform tiles.

  • 1-Bit Platformer Pack by Kenney
  • 1-Bit Pack by Kenney
Audio
  • Retro Music Pack by JDBArtist
  • Ultimate Sound FX Bundle by Sidearm Studios
Font
  • Source Code Pro by Paul D. Hunt
Shaders
  • CTR Shader by Hiulit
  • Dissolve Shader by GDQuest
